title: Radio Thing
summaries: The Radio Thing is a vanity accessory that activates a sepia screen shader effect identical to that of The Constant world seed in normal worlds. In The Constant seed, it will instead cancel out the screen effect, granting the player normal visuals. The accessory functions in both the ordinary inventory slots and vanity accessory slots. The Radio Thing has a 1/3 (33.33%) chance of being dropped by Deerclops.

statistics.Tooltip:
Allows the user to see the world differently
'Forbidden Knowledge echoes from the radio...'
statistics.Sell: 1 GC
